Text: Cool film. En liten fråga bara, varför får jag inget ljud?

The movie looks great.

 A russian/german movie without any subs (not counting the slovenian subs included in the release coz uhmm my understanding of slovenian is kinda crap) is pointless tho. Does anyone know where to get proper english/danish/swedish subs for this release?

Thanx for the upload anyway - a very nice rip :)
